title: 1069 - Novel Updates
tags: Businessmen   Different Social Status   First-time Interc**rse   Forced into a Relationship   Handsome Male Lead   Mismatched Couple   R*pe Victim Becomes Lover   R*pe   Wealthy Characters
author: 天一   小狗爪子   狗娃子
description:
R*ped! R*ped!

The next CEO of Rong Hua corporation was r*ped! He was r*ped by an unknown man at the construction site with his hands tied and blindfolded! Rong Baiwen swore he would make that person’s life a living hell!

The man who r*ped him turned out to be one of the construction workers on the construction site! He hired a group of gangsters to gang r*pe that man for revenge, but the gangsters were too weak and ended up getting beaten up. 

Even when he’s in a simple shed at the construction site, kneeling on a crude bed made of wooden planks, wiggling his snow-white ass to meet the man’s thrusting and couldn’t stop moaning and screaming, he would never admit that he’s attracted to a migrant worker.

“You’re a wolf in sheep’s clothing, you pervert!” 

“Baby, you’re my exquisite sheep!”>
